name: Anime show 动漫时装秀
description: Twelve sexy girls compete with each other for the title of Miss Anime VR.Take part in the show as jury and decide which girl’s dream will becometrue and choose the winner of anime fashion show.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or better Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (or equivalent) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (or equivalent) Storage: 900 MB available space
